LanguageData.CraftHempFlour.label: 研磨大麻面粉
LanguageData.CraftHempFlour.description: 将大麻种子研磨成用于烘焙的大麻面粉
LanguageData.BulkCraftHempFlour.label: 研磨大麻面粉 (大量)
LanguageData.BulkCraftHempFlour.description: 由大麻种子研磨制成的烘焙的大麻面粉
LanguageData.CraftSmokeleafSeedOil.label: 压榨烟草食用油
LanguageData.CraftSmokeleafSeedOil.description: 把烟草种子压榨成食用油
LanguageData.BulkCraftSmokeleafSeedOil.label: 压榨烟草食用油 (bulk)
LanguageData.BulkCraftSmokeleafSeedOil.description: 把烟草种子压榨成大量食用油
LanguageData.MakeHempMilk.label: 制作大麻奶
LanguageData.MakeHempMilk.description: 将在水中浸泡过的烟草种子研磨成“奶”.
LanguageData.MakeHempMilkBulk.label: 制作大麻奶 (bulk)
LanguageData.MakeHempMilkBulk.description: 将大量在水中浸泡过的烟草种子研磨成“奶”
LanguageData.MakeHempProtein.label: 研磨大麻蛋白质粉
LanguageData.MakeHempProtein.description: 将大麻种子研磨成细腻的粉末以补充蛋白质
LanguageData.MakeHempProteinBulk.label: 研磨大麻蛋白质粉 (大量)
LanguageData.MakeHempProteinBulk.description: 将大量大麻种子研磨成细腻的粉末以补充蛋白质
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafButter.label: 制作烟叶黄油
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafButter.description: 把烟叶花苞在牛奶中泡煮然后制成黄油
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafButterBulk.label: 制作烟叶黄油 (大量)
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafButterBulk.description: 把烟叶花苞在牛奶中泡煮然后制成黄油
LanguageData.BakeSmokeleafCookies.label: 烘焙烟叶小甜饼
LanguageData.BakeSmokeleafCookiesBulk.label: 烘焙烟叶小甜饼 (大量)
LanguageData.BakeSmokeleafBrownies.label: 烘焙烟叶布朗尼
LanguageData.BakeSmokeleafBrownies.description: 烘焙“特别”美味的布朗尼
LanguageData.BakeSmokeleafBrowniesBulk.label: 烘焙烟叶布朗尼中 (大量)
LanguageData.BakeSmokeleafBrowniesBulk.description: 烘焙“特别”美味的布朗尼
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafNutriLeafBar.label: 制作烟叶营养棒
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafNutriLeafBarBulk.label: 制作烟叶营养棒 (大量)
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafDeEnergyDrink.label: 制作烟叶能量饮料
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafDeEnergyDrink.description: 烟草成瘾者约奇一直在研究的饮料...他把这饮料叫做五小时能量饮.这是一款很有潜力的饮料
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafDeEnergyDrinkBulk.label: 制作烟叶能量饮料 (大量)
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafDeEnergyDrinkBulk.descripti: 烟草成瘾者约奇一直在研究的饮料...他把这饮料叫做五小时能量饮.这是一款很有潜力的饮料
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafSmoothie.label: 制作烟叶奶昔
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafSmoothie.description: 把搅拌机填满大麻叶然后搅拌成美味的烟叶奶昔
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafSmoothieBulk.label: 制作烟叶奶昔 (大量)
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafSmoothieBulk.description: 把搅拌机填满大麻叶然后搅拌成美味的烟叶奶昔
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafCandy.label: 制作烟叶硬糖
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafCandy.description: 将果汁，烟草蒸馏液，烟草食用油一起加入糖浆在搅拌然后冷却成美味的硬糖.
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafCandyBulk.label: 制作烟叶硬糖 (大量)
LanguageData.MakeSmokeleafCandyBulk.description: 将果汁，烟草蒸馏液，烟草食用油一起加入糖浆在搅拌然后冷却成大量美味的硬糖
LanguageData.CookMealInfused.label: 烹饪大麻餐
LanguageData.CookMealInfused.description: 烹饪餐点时加点烟叶黄油会让食用者十分享受这份餐点
LanguageData.BulkCookMealInfused.label: 烹饪大麻餐 (大量)
LanguageData.BulkCookMealInfused.description: 烹饪餐点时加点烟叶黄油会让食用者十分享受这份餐点，足够让五人食用 烹饪大麻餐中
